author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-4476 uima-ducc-vm has too many JDs?
- employ permits via BoundedSempahores to restrict max jobs to 3 and max reservations (managed + unmanaged) to 2
- on each thread issue cancel for the previous (supposedly Completed) job before submitting next one (just for insurance purposes)
